hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Dharr said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: 'When any one of you stands in prayer, let him not smooth the pebbles, for he is facing Mercy

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنْ مَسْحِ الْحَصَى، فِي الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The prohibition of smoothing the pebbles while praying
